thread.title: Quentin Tarantino to Black Critics: My Race Is Irrelevant
thread.title_full: Quentin Tarantino to Black Critics: My Race Is Irrelevant

title: Quentin Tarantino to Black Critics: My Race Is Irrelevant
text:
Quentin Tarantino to Black Critics: M... Quentin Tarantino to Black Critics: My Race Is Irrelevant Next Story Prev Story 4 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
"It's been a long time since the subject of a writer's skin was mentioned as often as mine," said the 'Hateful Eight' director. Quentin Tarantino is over being criticized because he is a white writer and director whose movies include the N-word.   Hollywood Reporter.
